body:
Hi everyone,



I have imported an IDF and create new schedule based on occupancy and all the definition works.

I would like to optimize the results using octopus but after 3 simulation the energy plus run component stops working. 

Someone can you help me?



Thanks in advance. 

Best,



Andrea

replies.body: Hi Andrea, Does it give you an error? What do you mean by "stops working"?

Hi Mostapha,



I have these two errors related to cooling setpoint and setback and another time related to name.

But I don't have any idea why it doesn't work only during octopus optimization.

If you have other questions don't hesitate.

Thank you so much.

Best,



Andrea
Hi Andrea, Does the same case works if you re-run it manually? I need to take a closer look to your file. In both cases it seems that not all the data is written to idf file correctly.

Hi Mostapha,

It sometimes happens also if I run manually but just few times compared to octopus analysis.

Thanks

Best,



Andrea
